data.text: @enousc science saying people should get the vaccine.

@enousc Excuse me?! I’m not the one giving medical advice. The doctors are. The doctors, along with real science are the ones telling everyone they should get the vaccine. I’m just agreeing with them.

And I’m not worried about liability since I’m simply agreeing with the doctors and...

@SuperGrobanite Will you accept liability and responsibility for anyone who followed your advice, took the Vax, and suffered injuries?

If not.

Shame on you.

And stop giving medical advice.
